feed.title: YTPTube Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.0
entry.content:
Hopefully this release fixes the remaining bugs and should be the template for v1.0.0, there are some backwards compatibility things left in the code base, those will be removed for the final release.

  • 438254c Added task to kill debugpy, sometimes vscode leave it behind causing problems during development by @arabcoders
  • 4e1a1e6 Add loading screen by @arabcoders
  • dcaeb7a migrated more code to ts by @arabcoders
  • 584d4e1 Added toggle for task handler. by @arabcoders
  • e44077b typo by @arabcoders
  • 6c7542e Fixed incorrect form control for handler enable by @arabcoders
  • da53055 use info color for exporting icon by @arabcoders
  • 4b0522e Added list view for notifications. by @arabcoders
  • 5942d12 migrated presets.vue to ts by @arabcoders
  • c94a4e5 migrated file browser to ts by @arabcoders
  • 964a24c completed the ts migration by @arabcoders
  • 7b9144b added cli opts support for info extraction endpoint by @arabcoders
  • 781b767 Add support for converting youtube handle channels urls to channel_id. Closes #353 by @arabcoders
  • 36b590c Fix automatic premiere re-queue. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.1
entry.content:
• 15ab126 external packages updates by @arabcoders
  • 432f277 respect auto_start when re-queuing item by @arabcoders
  • 918b11f do not consider auto_start False items as stale by @arabcoders
  • 1fbe80c allow custom PPs by @arabcoders
  • 3918fa0 hard reset YTDLPOpts. by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.2
entry.content: • da6bd95 Fix threading issue on windows exe by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.4
entry.content:
• c6535f0 Update the pyinstaller build to include version number. by @arabcoders
  • 92a6101 Add exception catch for sub download task by @arabcoders
  • bac1a51 Do not register signals in non posix OS by @arabcoders
  • 7e4fd51 fix windows build by @arabcoders

entry.title: New release for YTPTube: v0.6.5
entry.content:
• 2bfa45e vscode luncher updates by @arabcoders
  • 48fb353 Added force download switch by @arabcoders
  • 2d82737 Add configurable download_path depth env to control auto complete depth by @arabcoders
